Common_Symptoms: Fever, cough, sore throat, body aches, fatigue
Shortness of breath, wheezing, chest tightness, cough
Nasal congestion, facial pain or pressure, headache, postnasal drip
Possible_Alternative_Diseases: Allergic rhinitis, common cold, nasal polyps

Common_Symptoms: Severe headache, nausea, vomiting, sensitivity to light and sound
Possible_Alternative_Diseases: Tension headache, cluster headache, sinus headache

Common_Symptoms: Runny or stuffy nose, sore throat, cough, sneezing, fatigue
Fever, chills, cough with phlegm or pus, difficulty breathing, fatigue
Sneezing, runny or stuffy nose, itchy or watery eyes, rash
Fever, cough, shortness of breath, fatigue, loss of taste or smell
Sore throat, difficulty swallowing, swollen tonsils, fever
Frequent urination, increased thirst, unexplained weight loss, fatigue, blurred vision
Fever, chills, sweats, headache, nausea, vomiting, fatigue
Possible_Alternative_Diseases: Dengue fever, typhoid fever, viral hepatitis
